word_mean: 由上胚层细胞增殖并迁出的部分细胞进入下胚层，并逐渐全部置换了下胚层细胞而形成的新的细胞层。

sentence.Network_en: These epithelial elements arise embryologically from foregut endoderm in the process of bronchial tubular growth.

sentence.Network_en: Successive section sees endoderm has exfoliate phenomenon.
sentence.Network_cn: 连续切片见内皮层有剥脱现象.
